Room.Name: Marina Way/Overland Drive Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Overland Drive and Marina Way.
Room.LongDescription: Marina Way runs north to south through most of town, and acts primarily as a delivery route for most of the shops to the west. The main entrance to these shops is located off of Main Street. Overland Drive heads through the large estates of the wealthy Oceancrestillians to the east. It also heads west towards the administrative sections of the town.
